/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant mix of green and yellow, suggesting that the season is autumn. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
